rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0001
rows.name:
Ooh...
"A treat fit for a hero"!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0002
rows.name:
Snack time already, Nia?
Spot anything interesting?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0003
rows.name:
Nice one, Nia! You sniffed out
a pretty cushty place.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0004
rows.name:
Y'know, this was the great
hero Adel's favorite food!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0005
rows.name:
They say it uses an authentic mix of
spices passed down for 500 years.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0006
rows.name:
Luxuria is pretty damn cold.
Stands to reason that Adel would
like food with a bit of kick to it, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0007
rows.name: A "kick"?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0008
rows.name:
Adel was into spicy stuff? Huh.
Heroes have strange tastes.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0009
rows.name:
Rather rude, don't you think?
Spicy food is delicious!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0010
rows.name:
Don't tell me you're some kind of
namby-pamby when it comes to heat.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0011
rows.name:
And what would be the
problem with that?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0012
rows.name:
Ha ha ha, for all your tough facade
you're really just a little kid ain'tcha?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0013
rows.name:
Oi, you watch it, Shellhead.
You're askin' for a fight!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0014
rows.name:
Hey, no need to get your ears ruffled.
I'm gonna get some for you and
you'll see how wrong you are.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0015
rows.name: Hikari, you want some too?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0017
rows.name: Huh? What's up?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0018
rows.name: Um, well, you see...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0019
rows.name: Adel didn't like spicy food either.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0020
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0021
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0022
rows.name: So that means...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0023
rows.name:
Adel didn't actually like Adel's
Embercakes?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0024
rows.name: So the advertising slogan is just lying?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0101
rows.name:
You got it. I never saw him
eat anything that spicy.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0102
rows.name:
Even a hint of spice would have him
running for the latrine!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0103
rows.name:
Bwahaha!
So Adel had a little kid's tastes too.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0104
rows.name:
You're kidding me!
You can't tell me stories like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0105
rows.name:
I grew up idolizing Adel, and now
I can't get that image out of my head.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0106
rows.name:
Hey, Hikari.
Do you have any other funny stories?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0107
rows.name:
Funny stories?
I wonder if I can remember anything.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0108
rows.name:
So like, what was Adel's real
favorite food?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0109
rows.name: Well, that would be Pan-Fried Tartari.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0110
rows.name: Just like Rex!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0111
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0112
rows.name:
Adel would just light up at the
sight of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0113
rows.name:
It really sounds like the Great Hero was
just a big kid when it came to food.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0114
rows.name: Anything else?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0115
rows.name:
Stop, stop!
I can't take anymore!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0116
rows.name:
Can you please leave at least some of
my admiration for him untainted?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0117
rows.name:
What do you care?
Adel was just a guy like anyone else.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0118
rows.name:
Look who's the big kid
now, Shellhead!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0119
rows.name:
You arse, Nia. You're loving this,
aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0120
rows.name: Dammit!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0121
rows.name:
I'm going to have to reread "Adel, the
Great Hero" to scrub my mind.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0201
rows.name:
Yep. It's a total marketing gimmick.
A load of bull, in other words.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0202
rows.name:
Bloody liars!
The cheek of it!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0203
rows.name:
Steady on just a second, chaps.
It's not definite that they're lying.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0204
rows.name: Eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0205
rows.name:
Even if this wasn't Adel's favorite
food, you've still gotta hand it to them.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0206
rows.name:
Keeping 500-year-old traditions alive
is a pretty noble thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0207
rows.name:
So what if they did exaggerate? Maybe
Adel had a bite when Hikari wasn't
looking and thought "this is jolly tasty".

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0208
rows.name:
No need to get so worked up,
Shellhead.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0209
rows.name: Who's worked up?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0210
rows.name: It's nothing to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0211
rows.name:
I'm just saying, don't go around calling
ancient recipes a lie for no reason!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0212
rows.name:
Ah, OK, I see what's
going on here.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0213
rows.name:
I've a sneaking suspicion that this
might be Zeke's favorite food...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0214
rows.name: Wha-

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0215
rows.name:
Oh, is it your favorite because you
believed their shtick about Adel?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0216
rows.name: Uhh...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0217
rows.name:
Bwahaha, busted!
Is that why you took it to heart?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0218
rows.name: You're like a little kid!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0219
rows.name: Wh-wh-what's wrong with that?!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0220
rows.name:
I grew up believing this was
Adel's favorite food!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0221
rows.name:
It's been enchanting kids for 500
years now!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0222
rows.name:
I'm not gonna let the words of
one Blade take that away!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0223
rows.name:
Sure, but that still doesn't change the
fact that Adel didn't like spicy food.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0224
rows.name:
He'd never eat this stuff of his
own volition.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0225
rows.name: Aaaagh!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0226
rows.name:
You're shattering my image of him!
My precious childhood innocence...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0227
rows.name:
I don't believe anyone
or anything anymore...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0228
rows.name: Don't be like that, Shellhead.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0229
rows.name:
Cheer up, I'll buy you an embercake!
Hah!
